feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [DC][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 20, 03:00 - 07:00 UTC

Jun 20, 22:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/07/2023 03:00 UTC
End time : 20/07/2023 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [BHS1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam
entry.content:
Jun 14, 21:28 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 14/06/2023 20:00 UTC
End Time : 14/06/2023 20:57 UTC
Root cause : Maintenance link
Root cause : Our technical teams resolved the issue. All services are operational.

Jun 14, 20:03 UTC
Identified - Start time: 14/06/2023 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some customers won't have access to Veeam service in BHS1 tonight
Root cause : Maintenance link
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [BHS1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam
entry.content:
Jun 13, 20:42 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/06/2023 18:07 UTC
End Time : 13/06/2023 20:30 UTC
Service impact : Some customers didn't have access to Veeam service in BHS1
Root cause : Hardware issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
